fields.name: timeMode
fields.description: Time Transfer Mode: 0 Disabled, 1 Survey In, 2 Fixed Mode

sub_fields.name: lla
sub_fields.description: Position is given in LAT/LON/ALT (default is ECEF)

sub_fields.name: altInv
sub_fields.description: Altitude is not valid, in case lla was set

fields.name: ecefXOrLat
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF X coordinate or latitude

fields.name: ecefYOrLon
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF Y coordinate or longitude

fields.name: ecefZOrAlt
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF Z coordinate or altitude

issues: Incomplete extraction: Stated payload length is 28, but only extracted fields totaling 20 bytes.

adjudication.reasoning: UBX-CFG-TMODE2 is a 28-byte message across u-blox 8, 9, and M10 series documentation (unless replaced by TMODE3). Extraction 1 correctly identifies the payload length as 28 but fails to list the final two 4-byte fields (svinMinDur and svinAccLimit). Extraction 2 provides a complete and accurate representation of the full 28-byte payload.
